The regional consultant, I feel, should be paid on the
basis of expenses plus § 50. per diem.
So far as finding Headquarters specialists is con¬
cerned I think we have a big problem. I wonder if the
best solution for this would not be to pole the educa¬
tional broadcasting field and choose the top two. As
far as our staff is concerned I would like to suggest
Bob Schenkkan, and on the regional consultant basis
of course I would be available.
Hope this is what you want and see you in Wisconsin.
Sincerely yours.
Director, Region II
